nodes.text: The Shock Cannon was a deployable heavy weapon employed by the Galactic Empire. It was a portable gun emplacement that moved under its own power. Deployed on the battlefield, it was used to take out heavily armored targets, such as fortresses and bunkers.
Shock Cannons appear in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds and its 2002 expansion pack Clone Campaigns.
